FuncDef: This command sets the time interval, in minutes, that the system waits for between two consecutive runs of the route-download process. The time is counted from the start-time of the run, thus, if an route-download process is still ongoing by the time the timer expires, the process will restart from count=1.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the time interval, in minutes, between the start of the last route downloader run and the start of the next route downloader run. Values-1 to 1440.
